doc:
Gailard Sartain https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gailard_Sartain 0 Gailard Sartain (born September 18, 1946) is a former American actor, often playing characters with roots in the South. He was a regular on the country music variety series Hee Haw. He is also known for his roles in three of the Ernest movies and Hey Vern, It's Ernest. He is also an accomplished and successful painter and illustrator. Gailard_Sartain ( born September_18_,_1946 ) is a_former_American_actor , often playing characters with roots in the_South . He was a_regular on the_country_music_variety_series_Hee_Haw . He is_also_known for his_roles in three of the_Ernest_movies and Hey_Vern , It 's Ernest . He is also an_accomplished_and_successful_painter_and_illustrator .
